practice_phrases.target: I want to be ready to go
I am going to be ready soon
is she ready to speak English?

practice_phrases.known: 我猜我很快就准备好要开始学习了
practice_phrases.target: I guess I am going to be ready to start learning soon

practice_phrases.known: 我喜欢感觉好像我准备好了，因为我想很好地说英语
practice_phrases.target: I like feeling as if I am ready, because I want to speak English well
